example.name: transitive
example.text: It would contradict that objective if the appropriations clause ( technically a limitation on legislative power ) could be read [*-52] as [*-52] placing the president on Congress 's short leash , [*-52] making the executive consist of the president and every member of Congress .
example.arg: if the appropriations clause ( technically a limitation on legislative power ) could be read [*-52] as [*-52] placing the president on Congress 's short leash , [*-52] making the executive consist of the president and every member of Congress

predicate.note: Frames file for 'contradict' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
